name: SideBuy
overview:
SideBuy.com is a group buying daily deal aggregator that categorizes and simplifies all local deals. The service is designed to provide customers with an easy to navigate and simple user interface overview of daily deals happening around their local cities.

Deals on SideBuy.com are ranked on a popularity basis but personalized for each user. The more users interact with the service viewing and liking deals the more the service learns about their interests and suggest deals that find more interesting to users.

Users can add deals into their watching list and track the soon-to-expire deals.

The site is also available on mobile devices providing an easy to use interface for various devices such as Androids and iPhones.
